module.name: pyzor
module.summary: Pyzor is a distributed, collaborative spam detection and filtering network.

interface.name: pyzor_domtrans
interface.summary: Execute pyzor with a domain transition.

interface.name: pyzor_exec
interface.summary: Execute pyzor in the caller domain.

template.name: pyzor_per_role_template
template.summary: The per role template for the pyzor module.

desc.p: This template allows pyzor to manage files in a user home directory, creating files with the correct type.
This template is invoked automatically for each user, and generally does not need to be invoked directly by policy writers.

param.name: userdomain_prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the user domain (e.g., user is the prefix for user_t).
